@coryetzkorn @Netlify Not currently. There are third party integrations for adding a comments system to a static site, or you can use a few of the building blocks available in @Netlify already to build your own. I did that including a moderation system in @SlackHQ. Example: https://t.co/h9g7rtmRV9
